titlestmt.titleproper: Office of Faculty Affairs at the Friedman School of Nutrition Science and Policy RecordsUA242

publicationstmt.publisher: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-04-06 18:46:31 -0400.

repository.corpname: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

did.unittitle: Office of Faculty Affairs at the Friedman School of Nutrition Science and Policy Records

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Office of Faculty Affairs, Friedman School of Nutrition Science and Policy

did.abstract: This collection documents the administration and work of the Office of Faculty Affairs at the Friedman School of Nutrition Science. Also included is documentation of individual centers and programs, such as the International Food and Nutrition Center, the Famine Center, and the Agriculture, Food, and Environment program.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged in 4 series: Office files; Meeting minutes and agendas; Course files and curriculum development; and 2016 accessions.

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: This collection was created in April 2016.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection documents the administration and work of the Office of Faculty Affairs, including strategic planning, policies and procedures, memos, Board of Trustees correspondence, Dean's files, committee minutes, and curriculum development files. Also included is documentation of individual centers and programs, such as the International Food and Nutrition Center, the Famine Center, and the Agriculture, Food, and Environment program.

processinfo.head: Processing status
processinfo.p: Processing of the 2016 accessions completed by Leah Edelman in 2018. Materials were placed in archival boxes if the orignal housing was damaged. A box-level inventory and series-level description were created and the finding aid was updated at the time of processing.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection contains some restricted material. Restrictions related to specific material are listed in the detailed contents list.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Transferred by the Office of Faculty Affairs of the Friedman School, 2016.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Some material in this collection may be protected by copyright and other rights. Please see "Reproductions and Use" on the Digital Collections and Archives website for more information about reproductions and permission to publish. Copyright to all materials created by Tufts University employees in the course of their work is held by the Trustees of Tufts University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series documents the administration of the Office of Faculty Affairs, including strategic planning, memos, Board of Trustees correspondence, and International Food and Nutrition Center records.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This series is arranged by subject, as received from the Office of Faculty Affairs.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Strategic planning, memos, Board of Trustees correspondence, International Food and Nutrition Center records.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series includes meeting minutes and agendas for the Faculty, Curriculum and Degrees Committee, and the Committee on Committees, as well as related task forces.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This series is arranged by committee, as received from the Office of Faculty Affairs.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Meeting minutes and agendas of the Faculty, 1990-2006; records related to the faculty handbook project, 2006.

did.unittitle: Faculty meetings, Curriculum and Degrees Committee, Committee on Committees

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Meeting minutes and agendas of the Faculty, 1997-2009; Curriculum and Degrees Committee, 1997-2010; and Committee on Committees, 1998-2008.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series documents courses and curriculum development, including development of programs such as the Agriculture, Food, and Environment program and the Famine Center. Also included are academic integrity polices, other policies and procedures, graduate questionnaires, and NRC assessment records.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This series is arranged by subject, as received from the Office of Faculty Affairs.

did.unittitle: Course files, NRC assessment, Famine Center
Academic integrity, policies and procedures, graduate questionnaires, AFE program

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This series is arranged in received order. Within boxes, folders are arranged chronologically.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Transferred by the Office of Faculty Affairs of the Friedman School, 2016, accession 2016.114.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: University records are closed for 20 years from the date of creation. Records older than 20 years that do not pertain to student education, staff and faculty employment and Board of Trustees records are open for research.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains Curriculum and Degree Committee files from 1983-2013, as well as Dean Kennedy's files from 1999-2005, including files on foundations and funds, grants and proposals, strategic and financial planning, awards, media coverage, reports, and meetings.
